plurals.name: label_delete_account_description
plurals.item:
You\'re about to permanently delete %d account

Deleting an account from the authenticator won\'t disable the 2 factor authentication.

Make sure to disable the 2FA on the website/service the account is tied to.

You\'re about to permanently delete %d accounts

Deleting an account from the authenticator won\'t disable the 2 factor authentication.

Make sure to disable the 2FA on the website/service the account is tied to.
